INTRO_TEXT: Soon you will be able to browse the marketplace in your area and post your own listings for free. Click the button to learn more.
AGREE_TO: By signing up you agree to our
PASSWORD_MINLENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
TITLE: Brand name
DESCRIPTION-PLACEHOLDER: Food and non-food items shop. Exclusive handmade culinary and confectionery products.
FOLLOW_LEGAL_TERMS: I will use this app in accordance with the laws of the country.
RECOVER_PASSWORD_TEXT: Please enter your email address and we'll send you an link to reset your password.
DELIVERY_COSTS_PLACEHOLDER: (How much will it cost for you to deliver an item)
DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this listing?
SLIDE_1_TEXT: We will quickly introduce you to the main features.
SLIDE_2_TEXT: Clicking the blue button with the plus symbol will allow you to quickly add the items you want to sell.
SLIDE_3_TEXT: Swipe a listing (or an order) left or right to access quick actions.
SLIDE_4_TEXT: If you are selling items measured by weight, specify it in the title (e.g., "Apples, 1kg"). You can also try offering "A basket of fruits" instead of apples or oranges separately.
SLIDE_5_TEXT: While in-app payments & delivery service is still in development, we will generate an invoice for your customers based on the data you provided. You are free to choose any delivery method you like.
SLIDE_6_TEXT: If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to contact us any time at pard@pard.app
DEVELOPMENT_NOTICE: Note: the app is currently in active development and may behave unexpectedly.
REJECT_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to reject this order?
